// src/pages/LandingPage.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { FiArrowRight, FiCheckCircle, FiUsers, FiLayout } from 'react-icons/fi'; import BackgroundImage from '../assets/background.jpg'; // Logo'yu import et import LogoImage from '../assets/logo.png'; const LandingPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (
{/* --- HEADER --- */}
{/* İkon yerine Logo Resmi */} GazozHub
{user ? ( Go to Dashboard ) : ( <> Sign In Sign Up )}
{/* --- HERO SECTION --- */}
{/* Ana Logo (İsteğe bağlı, başlık üstüne de büyükçe koyabiliriz, şimdilik sadece navbar'da var) */}

Manage Projects
Like a Pro.

The ultimate collaboration platform for students and teams. Track issues, discuss ideas, share files, and manage tasks with a powerful Kanban board.

{user ? ( Continue to Dashboard ) : ( Get Started for Free )} {!user && ( Login )}
} title="Kanban Board" desc="Visualize your workflow with intuitive drag-and-drop task management." /> } title="Team Collaboration" desc="Invite members, assign roles (Viewer/Editor), and chat in real-time." /> } title="Issue Tracking" desc="Log bugs, feature requests, and keep track of project health." />
{/* FOOTER */}
© {new Date().getFullYear()} GazozHub. Built for collaboration.
); }; const FeatureCard = ({ icon, title, desc }) => (
{icon}

{title}

{desc}

); export default LandingPage;
